data.author: Ronny Carr

changelog.release_notes: This update adds support for Pebble Classic and Steel (Aplite platform)
- Updates to support the new server configuration
- Finally fixes the issue loading settings if the app isn't already open

- Fix an issue loading app settings on the phone
- Simplified configuration screen on the watch

- Use the standard Pebble config window
- The app will no longer be visible in the app launcher on the watch

- Another change to the on-screen message
- Some other minor adjustments

Introducing support for even more reservations from TripIt!

Including basic support for:
- lodging
- car rentals
- restaurant reservations
- activities (meetings, concerts, etc.)
- and cruises!

As always, please reach out if you have comments or questions. I love to hear your feedback! If you enjoy using Flights, please consider giving it a heart in the app store. Thank you to those that have!

* Want to help support further improvement and features? You can subscribe with PayPal right from the settings screen in the Pebble app. Thank you for your support and for using Flights!
A couple of bug fixes, things should be in working order now. Send an email if you are still experiencing problems.

The Timeline Release!

A significant amount of work has gone into the backend portion of this app, and so this version features only timeline integration. More to come for the actual watch app in the future!

data.description:
Travel info in your timeline. Flights, reservations, weather, reminders, and more. Connect with TripIt® to automatically sync trips.

Travel + First Class
Upgrade Your Travel Experience
============================
Real-time flight status notifications, Priority Access, and the exclusive Departure watchface. One time $2.99 in-app purchase via KiezelPay. Learn more in Travel's settings.

Have a question or need help getting started? Tap "email developer" near the bottom of this page.

Available In:
English, Español, Français, Italiano, Nederlands, Português, Svenska

This product uses the TripIt API but is not endorsed or certified by TripIt. Flight data powered by FlightStats®. Weather data powered by Dark Sky.

Learn more at http://travelapp.rocks
data.title: Travel
